title: Apple Orchards in Kashmir
author: Aarif Lone
excerpt: The apple orchards of Kashmir are not just an agricultural marvel, but a cultural symbol...
content: The apple orchards of Kashmir are not just an agricultural marvel, but a cultural symbol deeply embedded in the valley's identity. During autumn, the orchards turn into a sea of red and green, attracting visitors from around the world. Apple farming sustains thousands of families and is a major contributor to the region's economy...

title: Winter in the Valley
author: Fatima Khan
excerpt: Snow blankets the valley in silence, transforming daily life...
content: Winter in Kashmir is both harsh and beautiful. The snow-covered mountains reflect the pale sunlight, and life slows down as people gather around wood-burning stoves. Despite the challenges, winter festivals bring joy and togetherness...
